name: Divine Moments of Truth
description:
When the dreams become cloudy, the Divine Moments of Truth emerge and the chaos becomes order.

The DMT (Dimethyltryptamine) is an alkaloid which is present in all animals and plants, but in abundance in the Jurema Preta (Mimosa Hostillis) roots. It is used in indigenous rituals from brazilian northern ethnicities to enter the spiritual and dream world.
